thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 16 of 539
thread.title: Melissa

author: Melissa
title: Melissa
text:
The website is easy to navigate and the dresses are of the latest fashions and designers. Choosing was difficult, because there are so many beautiful dresses. The price was less than 1/2 of what the stores around my area charge for the same type of dress and the quality is equal (if not superior) to any of the dresses I could have bought in the stores. Another bonus is that this dress is very unique, so hopefully no one will have anything like my daughter! :)
I would definitely recommend this company for any formal needs! The dress was true to size and absolutely stunning in person. I was not nearly as crazy about the dress when I saw the picture of it, but my daughter was sold on it. I am so glad she talked me in to it, because it is absolutely perfect for her!
